Trade/Device Name(s): cobas Influenza A/B Nucleic Acid Test for Use on the cobas Liat System
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Real Time Nucleic Acid Amplification System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas Influenza A/B rapid multiplex RT-PCR assay for qualitative detection of Influenza A and B viral RNA on the cobas Liat System
Indications for Use Summary: Automated multiplex real-time RT-PCR assay for rapid qualitative detection and discrimination of Influenza A and B viral RNA in nasopharyngeal swab specimens from patients with respiratory infection signs and symptoms, used as an aid in differential diagnosis in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological factors.
